local Lighting = game:GetService("Lighting")
local sky = Instance.new("Sky", Lighting)
sky.SkyboxBk = "rbxassetid://134021505046890"
sky.SkyboxDn = "rbxassetid://134021505046890"
sky.SkyboxFt = "rbxassetid://134021505046890"
sky.SkyboxLf = "rbxassetid://134021505046890"
sky.SkyboxRt = "rbxassetid://134021505046890"
sky.SkyboxUp = "rbxassetid://134021505046890"

-- Apply decal to all surfaces of every part
local decalId = "rbxassetid://104938464961385"
local faces = {
	Enum.NormalId.Top,
	Enum.NormalId.Bottom,
	Enum.NormalId.Front,
	Enum.NormalId.Back,
	Enum.NormalId.Left,
	Enum.NormalId.Right
}

local function applyDecals(part)
	for _, face in ipairs(faces) do
		local decal = Instance.new("Decal")
		decal.Texture = decalId
		decal.Face = face
		decal.Parent = part
	end
end

for _, obj in pairs(workspace:GetDescendants()) do
	if obj:IsA("BasePart") then
		applyDecals(obj)
	end
end

workspace.DescendantAdded:Connect(function(obj)
	if obj:IsA("BasePart") then
		applyDecals(obj)
	end
end)
